Mon: %Gale: I got sand in my boot...
Tue: %Gale: I have a wizard's exam soon. I'm very nervous.
Thu: %Gale: This little island of ours is like a colorful gem in the ocean.
Sat: %Gale: There's plenty of natural forage around here.
Sun: %Gale: I'm working on a new magic sword. I want it to be fast and agile.
